meanings.definition: A prevailing tone or central theme
meanings.sent1: The keynote of the party was joy and celebration.
meanings.sent2: The keynote of the speech was unity and cooperation.
meanings.sent3: The keynote of the movie was laughter and friendship.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the keynote of her personality, always bright and welcoming.
meanings.sent5: The keynote of the painting was the vibrant colors that popped off the canvas.

meanings.sent1: The keynote of the meeting was to discuss the budget.
meanings.sent2: The keynote of the article highlighted the importance of exercise.
meanings.sent3: The keynote of the joke was the unexpected punchline.
meanings.sent4: The keynote of the story was the moral lesson it taught.
meanings.sent5: The keynote of the presentation was the impressive data analysis.

meanings.sent1: Honesty is the keynote of a strong relationship.
meanings.sent2: Patience is the keynote of successful teaching.
meanings.sent3: The keynote of a good book is a captivating plot.
meanings.sent4: The keynote of a healthy lifestyle is balanced nutrition.
meanings.sent5: Kindness is the keynote of a caring community.
